description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The Federal President visits France; meeting of the European Economic Community; the Berlin Film Festival; Dr Adenaur visits Berlin; refugees in Berlin; memorial to anti-Nazi resistance workers; the new Memorial Church in Berlin; meeting of Protestant clergy; the small north German town of Bad Zwischenahn; the fishing industry based on Bremerhaven; a festival of national costume in Reit-im-Winkl; the 92nd German Derby in Hamburg.
